subSections.title: Derived characters
subSections.text: * {{l|mul|[[𡞰]], [[𢰩]], [[滋]], [[𣕜]], [[𤍏]], [[𤧹]], [[磁]], [[禌]], [[糍]], [[𬗭]], [[𦖺]], [[𧛏]], [[鎡]]([[镃]]), [[𩝐]], [[𫚤]], [[鹚]], [[𬝘]], [[𡙛]], [[孳]], [[慈]], [[𭵝]], [[𡢫]], [[𤀟]], [[𥖃]]}} ''(Contains only'' 兹) * [[嗞#Translingual|嗞]], [[嵫#Translingual|嵫]], [[稵#Translingual|稵]] ''(Exception: Only for Chinese character forms. Japanese and Korean forms contain {{l|mul|茲}} instead)'' * [[㽧#Translingual|㽧]], [[𤮀#Translingual|𤮀]], [[𪑿#Translingual|𪑿]], [[𤂇#Translingual|𤂇]], [[𪇔#Translingual|𪇔]] ''(Exception: Only for {{w|zh:新字形|mainland China}} character form. {{w|zh:國字標準字體|Taiwan}} character form contains {{l|mul|茲}} instead)'' * [[螆#Translingual|螆]] ''(Exception: Only for {{w|zh:新字形|mainland China}} character form. {{w|zh:國字標準字體|Taiwan}} and {{w|Hong Kong Supplementary Character Set|Hong Kong}} character forms contain {{l|mul|茲}} while {{w|JIS X 0213|Japan}} character form contains {{l|mul|玆}} instead)'' * [[鰦#Translingual|鰦]] ''(Exception: Only for {{w|zh:新字形|mainland China}} character form. {{w|zh:國字標準字體|Taiwan}}, {{w|Hong Kong Supplementary Character Set|Hong Kong}} and {{w|JIS X 0213|Japan}} character forms contain {{l|mul|茲}} instead)'' * [[鷀#Translingual|鷀]] ''(Exception: Only for {{w|zh:新字形|mainland China}} and {{w|JIS X 0213|Japan}} character forms. {{w|zh:國字標準字體|Taiwan}}, {{w|Hong Kong Supplementary Character Set|Hong Kong}} and Korean character forms contain {{l|mul|茲}} instead)'' * [[䈘#Translingual|䈘]] ''(Exception: Only for {{w|zh:新字形|mainland China}} and {{w|zh:國字標準字體|Taiwan}} character forms. Korean character form contains {{l|mul|茲}} instead)'' * [[鶿#Translingual|鶿]] ''(Exception: Only for Chinese and Japanese character forms. Korean character form contains {{l|mul|玆}} instead)'' * [[甆#Translingual|甆]] ''(Exception: Only for Chinese and Korean character forms. {{w|JIS X 0213|Japan}} character form contains {{l|mul|茲}} instead)'' * [[𦔒#Translingual|𦔒]] ''(Exception: Only for {{w|zh:國字標準字體|Taiwan}} character form. {{w|Hong Kong Supplementary Character Set|Hong Kong}} character form contains {{l|mul|茲}} instead)''

subSections.title: Related characters
subSections.text: * {{l|mul|茲}} ''(Preferred form used in Taiwan) - See also its [[茲#Derived characters|derived characters]].'' * {{l|mul|玆}} ''({{w|Variant Chinese character|Variant form}} of ''兹)'' - See also its [[玆#Derived characters|derived characters]].''
